price: 10. U samir waxay (gaaladu) yidhaahdaan, oo uga dheerow si qurxoon.
arabic: وَٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱهۡجُرۡهُمۡ هَجۡرٗا جَمِيلٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-iṣ'bir ʿalā mā yaqūlūna wa-uh'jur'hum hajran jamīlan
